title: The Equations of Motion
text: Use the equation: $$v=u+a t$$, where v is the final velocity, u is the initial velocity (0 $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in this case), a is the acceleration, and $$t$$ is the time.

title: Velocity Calculation
text: Substitute the given values into the equation $$v=u+a t$$ to find the final velocity v.
